column2: About how long has it been since you COMPLETELY quit smoking cigarettes?
column9: Note to interviewer: Respondents who were classified as a "Former Smoker" by answering the Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, Question 1 as "Yes" (Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?) and Question 2 as "Not at all" (Do you now smoke every day, some days or not at all?) are asked.
